original_text: So he reasoned in the synagogue with the Jews and the devout persons, and in the marketplace every day with those who happened to be there.
korean_text: 회당에서는 유대인과 경건한 사람들과 또 장터에서는 날마다 만나는 사람들과 변론하니

sentences.original_text: So he reasoned in the synagogue
with the Jews and the devout persons
and in the marketplace every day
with those who happened to be there
